summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3654 , for the improvement of 24th Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Andover Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, by under Ordinance No. 45065 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
